titles.title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to permit remarried surviving spouses of veterans to be eligible for burial in a national cemetery.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Benefits.

bill.summary: 9/9/2002--Introduced. Makes all remarried surviving spouses of veterans eligible for burial in a national cemetery. (Currently, such eligibility is permitted only for remarried former spouses whose subsequent marriage was terminated by death or divorce.)
